text:
we experienced a strange problem which we were able to drill down to mpm-worker.
we're using apache doing rewriting to a backend zope server.
if a windows client requests a word document from the server the document is corrupted. this occurs on a 
very small percentage of windows clients. most of them work fine.
we tcpdumped, tried a lot of different combinations (apache versions, different machines,...) and were 
finally able to find out. mpm-worker was causing the problems.

we can reproduce the error in case you are interested in finding this bug.
creator: jodok.batlogg@lovelysystems.com
chip@force-elite.com
text:
Are you using mod_cache, mod_disk_cache or mod_mem_cache?

I assume since it is coming from Zope, you are using mod_proxy_http?

Did you test the 2.2.x branch?  Did it have the same problem?

creator: nick@webthing.com
text: No information; can't fix underspecified (and probably mooted) problem.
